publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2982 Iain Gray: Housing Improvement Taskforce-That the Parliament welcomes the publication of the first report of the Housing Improvement Task Force Issues in Improving Quality in Private Housing as an important step in meeting the Scottish Executive's commitment, as set out in Working Together for Scotland: A Programme for Government, to address the significant problems of housing quality in the private sector stock. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
